name: madpews battleground
description:
Those sneaky cats are trying to invade your backyard and are throwing stones at you! Defend yourself & show them who's the boss. Catch the stones and throw them back.

Controls:

  • Left/Right to move
  • C to catch
  • X to throw
  • Enter to Start
  • Shift for Help (on title screen)

A homebrew game for the original gameboy handheld console made by madpew during 12-a-year 2020. For full colorization a GBC bootrom/console is required.

This game is open source.
Check it out on github:
https://github.com/madpew/hello-asm
